message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints but $120 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $107.5?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking to keep the price closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate further to $100?
